txt.en: Destroy statues of the Dark Lord ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Statues and shrines to Sauron can be found at Amon Fuin in Parth Daenath.\n\nYou should destroy the statues and shrines to Sauron.
Statues and shrines to Sauron can be found at Amon Fuin in Parth Daenath.\n\nYou should destroy the statues and shrines to Sauron.
Destroy the statues and shrines to Sauron

The fortress of Amon Fuin houses the Mordorrim, a cult of evil Men who worship Sauron. Behind the walls of the fortress stand terrible statues and vile shrines at which are performed ritual sacrifices to the Dark Lord. You should destroy these statues and shrines, helping to cleanse some of the evils at Amon Fuin.

You have destroyed many statues of the Dark Lord and shrines to Sauron at the fortress of Amon Fuin. The evils of that place are deeply-rooted, but these efforts are a good start on behalf of the Great Alliance.
Destroyed many statues and shrines of Sauron's worship at Amon Fuin.
The fortress of Amon Fuin houses the Mordorrim, a cult of evil Men who worship Sauron.
